name: Customertimes Corp
description:
Customertimes is providing professional services - Salesforce.com implementation services and consulting Salesforce.com administration, and proactive support of existing Salesforce.com projects in mobile technology and outsourcing services to customers in 63 countries around the globe.
Customertimes has a team of more than 300 talented and enthusiastic consultants, developers, business analysts, and mobile experts who have accumulated unique knowledge and experience in Customer Relationship Management (CRM), particularly in Salesforce.com.Â
